name: HANDS UP-brakeing,entering,n eating (fan game)
description:
DISCLAMER:This is a fan game made by fans of hands up and has no affiliation with Joel G

Story: ula and margo are extremely hungry and due to it being late at night with all of there favorite food spots being closed the 2 decide to brake in to the places and stuff theme them self's as fast as possible before cops come

Controls:

Use the arrow keys to control ula or margo or for mobile players touch the screen on the left and right side to move the characters

Thanks to snipergames 15 for the art 

https://www.deviantart.com/snipergames15

And nitromix12 for the margo blob art

 https://www.deviantart.com/nitromix12
